Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000. Given its high quality and exceptional features, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
